title: RTCP (RTP Control Protocol)
summary: The RTP Control Protocol (RTCP) is a partner to the RTP protocol. RTCP is used to provide control and statistical information about an RTP media streaming session.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
